Name: Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter
Overview:
The glorious high-definition chaos from The First Encounter continues now in Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter, a remake of the classic arcade FPS Serious Sam: The Second Encounter. 

Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter includes spectacularly enhanced visuals and more special effects like Hippy and Kidâ€™s mode, with trademark frantic Single-play, newly developed Survival and Beast Hunt modes, along with all time favorite Cooperative play. Combine those with intense Versus and Team modes over 18 multiplayer maps and Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter is a worthy successor to the original masterpiece.
